subject: Re: [svn:parrot-pdd] r19204 - trunk/docs/pdds
body:
chromatic wrote:
>
> Classes are PMCs.  Are there benefits to pushing them one step further and making them Objects as well?
>   
A PDD15 class is an object in so far as it's an instance of a PMC. A PMC 
is a class, just written in C rather than PIR.

Jonathan
